ALWAYS ACTIVE: Shuri’s adaptive technology ensures her Ability Accuracy can’t be altered, and grants her immunity to Shock and Precision effects that aren’t her own.
Shuri’s attacks are non-contact and deal Energy Damage instead of Physical.
KINETIC MATRIX - MAX CHARGES: 10: Gain an indefinite Matrix Charge when struck or when Blocking attacks (5 on a Well-Timed Block). Lose 3 charges when struck by True Damage.
At max charges, new Matrix Charges become Armor Up Passives, increasing Armor Rating by 172.22 for 1 second, dropping off 1 at a time. Max Armor Ups: 20.
LIGHT AND MEDIUM ATTACKS: Consume 1 Matrix Charge to inflict a Shock Debuff dealing 6.5 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
Shocks inflicted with Critical Hits become Critical Shock Passives, multiplying their Energy Damage by Shuri’s Critical Damage Rating.
HEAVY ATTACKS: On Heavy Charge, consume 10 Matrix Charges to gain a 100% Untouchable Passive for 5 seconds.
On Heavy Hit, refresh any active Shock effects on the Opponent and consume any personal Precision Passives to convert that many active personal Shock Debuffs into Critical Shock Passives.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Predictive targeting AI ensures Shuri’s Special Attacks can’t be Evaded.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit grants Shuri a Matrix Charge and an indefinite Precision Passive, plus an extra Precision for every 10 Shock Debuffs the Opponent is suffering.
These don't count as Precisions and are consumed by Light and Medium hits to become Guaranteed Critical Hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On hit, refresh any active Shock effects and pause them for the duration of this Special Attack.
The final hit inflicts a Shock Debuff for each Critical Shock the Opponent is suffering, each dealing 6.5 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain 20 Matrix Charges.
Deal a burst of 19.5 Direct Damage for each Shock and Critical Shock effect the Opponent is suffering.

ALWAYS ACTIVE: Shuri’s adaptive technology ensures her Ability Accuracy can’t be altered, and grants her immunity to Shock and Precision effects that aren’t her own.
Shuri’s attacks are non-contact and deal Energy Damage instead of Physical.
KINETIC MATRIX - MAX CHARGES: 10: Gain an indefinite Matrix Charge when struck or when Blocking attacks (5 on a Well-Timed Block). Lose 3 charges when struck by True Damage.
At max charges, new Matrix Charges become Armor Up Passives, increasing Armor Rating by 222.22 for 1 second, dropping off 1 at a time. Max Armor Ups: 20.
LIGHT AND MEDIUM ATTACKS: Consume 1 Matrix Charge to inflict a Shock Debuff dealing 127.8 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
Shocks inflicted with Critical Hits become Critical Shock Passives, multiplying their Energy Damage by Shuri’s Critical Damage Rating.
HEAVY ATTACKS: On Heavy Charge, consume 10 Matrix Charges to gain a 100% Untouchable Passive for 5 seconds.
On Heavy Hit, refresh any active Shock effects on the Opponent and consume any personal Precision Passives to convert that many active personal Shock Debuffs into Critical Shock Passives.
SPECIAL ATTACKS: Predictive targeting AI ensures Shuri’s Special Attacks can’t be Evaded.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Each hit grants Shuri a Matrix Charge and an indefinite Precision Passive, plus an extra Precision for every 10 Shock Debuffs the Opponent is suffering.
These don't count as Precisions and are consumed by Light and Medium hits to become Guaranteed Critical Hits.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: On hit, refresh any active Shock effects and pause them for the duration of this Special Attack.
The final hit inflicts a Shock Debuff for each Critical Shock the Opponent is suffering, each dealing 127.8 Energy Damage over 20 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Gain 20 Matrix Charges.
Deal a burst of 383.4 Direct Damage for each Shock and Critical Shock effect the Opponent is suffering.
